wikipedia_page.main: William Roy Brien (11 November 1930 – 27 January 1987) was an English footballer who played one game for Port Vale in the Football League on 17 April 1954.

response: * 27 January 1987 – Roy Brien, 56, made his only Football League appearance in April 1954 as a half-back for Port Vale in the Third Division South.
* William Roy Brien (1930–1987), English football player
